global.description: Enemies behind the scene are more dangerous than those on the stage.

heroSection.start: Start your healthy eating journey today! We offer a variety of delicious and nutritious foods to help you grow healthier. Come join us and let's discover the joy of healthy eating together!

common.error_msg: Oops, the interface is abnormal. Please contact customer service.
common.exportSucceeded: Succeeded! Please click the download icon in the upper right corner to view the export record
common.exportFailedExceeds: Failed! Only data within 60 days can be exported. Please adjust the time range and try again
common.exportFailed: Failed! Please contact customer service for support
common.importSucceeded: Import succeeded. Please view the imported data in the list page!
common.importFailed: Import failed. Please check the file and try again!
common.parse_error: Failed, please check the reason via click the import/export botton on the right header
common.error1: Please upload file less than 10 MB.
common.supplement_information: Please supplement the box cargo information
common.must_usa_port: Please select a port in the United States
common.not_usa_port: Please select a port outside the United States
common.cusServiceDontExist: Customer service information does not exist
common.sureLogout: Are you sure to log out?
common.reLoginDesc: This account has been logged in from another location, and you have been forced to log out. If you are unaware of this operation, please change your password to ensure the security of your account.
